title: Lunchbox Shares Complaint Letter to Grocery Store + Mike D Wants To Be Part of Crazy Study + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should I Go to My HS Reunion Where I Was Bullied?
itunes:title: Lunchbox Shares Complaint Letter to Grocery Store + Mike D Wants To Be Part of Crazy Study + Bobby’s Mailbag: Should I Go to My HS Reunion Where I Was Bullied?
description:
Lunchbox gives us an update from yesterday about the grocery store that refused to sell him alcohol. He shares the complaint letter he wrote, and we say whether he should send it. Movie Mike D wants to be a part of a study where he watches 13 scary movies while wearing a FitBit to monitor his heart rate. A listener emails Bobby about if he thinks he should go to his high school reunion even though he was bullied there.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
